data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=o7affgBZeu0Q7kNvgGhop3g&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDQoY6Lwh4-_gtgRm7p4uNj4-dJVpV3WWh6HOvZGfQitg&oe=6702751C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BiLbHyuyRygQ7kNvgEj1Zlx&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDBz9veQchE2B7G0vOGcxAkNoA1NCtcue6nnXgbgwL3xw&oe=67027EA4)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=XS6EXCb1GV0Q7kNvgHxef1y&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBKQvQv8NMtiWIaVdP9em5pXKo6nizXqL5YIhU1XS3mRA&oe=67026607)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=apjZZKwxs7wQ7kNvgELfwX9&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDirhjjxOsvsKAQpS7lBw33B5KL4MWGQUfm_XWPpeK93Q&oe=670258E6)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NmNVgT7P3MUQ7kNvgGucA9t&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCY6h2U9Lh-dNarlD5efdkBdqoMj_TJSvWoXvqXGcYOhA&oe=67028558)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=r2okIhYvenEQ7kNvgHiDVFJ&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA2p0jjOEuUacir_B_s2X_0cKoQLsfz5CgvfAbBqV94DA&oe=670281D9)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1AP3pbEDpdsQ7kNvgFSnlXt&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDl6vVjN4ZF8cQfAgr1M7E5xO7pe6ubau41sKKXioGWDg&oe=670267F0)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=aeKy3NH4qXEQ7kNvgFn-3zF&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCdNtNiJ2zRn_x9ql6cSyeqmZ3Ho1lDMf0SuOeyDUk_gw&oe=6702526A)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8yirKjnKnW4Q7kNvgHANCeZ&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBzslT0Rv_ujA06AWksIqIWEihkHa3qjoPyqmjSKGUxYw&oe=67026617)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=G0GTO36JcKcQ7kNvgH8dSsK&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA8yl8xwCSVaG1pIO-oM6O6xmoNVFhWc74_wYwiB6Y04g&oe=6702818C)
